item.description:
**FLAGS ARE PROVIDED at the field**  We play year-round in ALL weather conditions.  We usually have 2 to 3 games running simultaneously from 12PM to 4PM EVERY Saturday.  The field is turf, but occasionally we'll have to move to the dirt field so...Bring Cleats if you have them.


The games are free of charge, however, donations are accepted to cover the cost of the flags/cones/markers/pylons and the meetup site fees.  Please see Eli the group organizer.  This time of year it is very crowded, so it is very likely we will need to use the dirt field.


Skill Level: All skill levels are welcome but players with flag football experience is helpful. (We can speed up the start of games by cutting down on time spent going over the rules).


CONTACT: Contact is allowed while blocking and for bumping receivers off the line.  Please be respectful of your fellow players while going up for passes to minimize mid-air collisions.

 

Not Allowed: Flag guarding, stiff arming and lowering your shoulders.

 

Playing time: Players should arrive before 12 so we can get a head count to determine how many games will be played and what part of the field(s) they will be played on.  Players come and go as they please as the day progresses.

Thanks

Donny and Eli

 

Back to 12pm

If we are kicked off for any reason, we will go to Danehy Park less than half a mile away. See below for directions to Danehy (there are three parking lots, so look for them on the map). http://maps.google.com/maps?q=danehy+park&hl=en&ll=42.388568,-71.135734&spn=0.008471,0.009431&fb=1&gl=us&cid=0,0,4421318752033664575&sqi=2&t=m&z=17&vpsrc=6 See you there.
item.name: Flag Football Saturday 12pm
